评论详情: I ordered 2 pairs of these in 2 different colors and absolutely love the fit and fabric. Sadly both pairs ended up coming apart in the crotch. The material was fine but the stitching just came apart. If you buy these please inspect the crotch before wearing just in case they come apart like mine.

I usually buy a different brand of wide leg pants but I can’t find them anymore so I decided to try these Oreint Trails….welp, I like them…a lot! After looking thru all the review pictures to get an idea of what the actual colors are, I decided on a pair that had no pics or reviews that I could find and who could go wrong with purple:) they are the nice dark color I was looking for and fit very comfortably. I am 5’7” tall and weigh 130 lbs, bought the medium and they are plenty long with just enough stretch in the waist to keep them up. I will be buying more of this brand!
The tie dye isn’t as vivid as the photo but I still like the pants a lot. They fit well and look great. I may purchase more.
The colors are insanely gorgeous and the fade from color to color is damn near flawless. Little long but nothing a hem wont fix. Dress them up or dress it down, either way these pants are keepers.

Great Quality Fits Correctly.

I ordered nebula pink but the color is different than the picture. I was bummed but it still looked cute. I like the high waist band and that they are comfortable. I'm 5'0 and 129lbs. I ordered medium and they are a bit long. Other than the length it was a good fit.
Get alot of compliments when I wear these. They are comfy. Wish they were a little longer and flared more, but overall great purchase.
Super comfy, super cute and true to size
I really like wearing these on Saturday these are my Saturday pink pants

I simply adore these great tie-dye pants. They're made of a lovely light flowy rayon, and the gorgeous dye pattern is actually dyed into the fabric, it is NOT a print. I love the stretchy waistband, totally non-binding and comfortable, especially if you're like me and have a sensitive tummy that can't stand tight elastic waistbands. This one feels like it's holding you, but not putting pressure on you. The waistband makes it so you can wear them high-waisted, or sitting on your hips (assuming your legs are long enough.)  The best part for me is that these pants are LONG. I have long legs and trying to find cute pants that are actually long enough is a trial. These hit me at the ankle, lower if I wear the waistband lower.  The baggy side pockets are cute. The colors in my pants (I bought two pairs of these) are beautiful, but in fairness the colors are a bit more muted than what is pictured above. However, anyone who loves tie-dye knows that no two are alike, and that's part of the beauty of that fabric art.  I do love these pants and recommend them highly. I hope I've been helpful!
Shopping for my 3rd pattern/color.
These pants are fantastic!  They are comfy and flowy.  The colors are beautiful too
These are adorable and I will definitely be ordering more.
Comfortable, stretchy waistband, great pockets. I’m 5’4” so they are a bit long. I usually wear a medium but could have gotten away with a small. Light fabric should wash nicely.
Loved them so much for electric forest!! And so comfy for home too, very breathable and good quality so far
So comfy, great colors. Better than I expected!
Pants are very long, if you're short you're definitely going to have to have these pants other than that they are very nice.

I am 5'9" and 180 lbs.  They fit perfectly and are great for long legs.  I would not recommend them for a shorter person as they go down to my heels.  But overall, it's a great addition and with all the colors you can wear almost any shirt.

I was scared that these would be too short on me because of some of the reviews but they are a perfect length even maybe a little long and I’m 5’11”

I bought these to have some comfy pants to wear around the house and I'm sooo pleased with them. The colors are gorgeous and maybe just a little darker than the picture. I like these very much; the color and feel of the fabric are very nice. They a little lightweight and very comfortable. They definitely run big. I’m keeping them, but if I end up ordering another color, I would get a size down.

These lightweight colorful pants are wonderful! I have order in 6 colors and they all are beautiful! I have washed them so much and the colors are still vibrant! Sizing is spot on, I am 5’ 9” and a xl covers my feet , with a peek of the toes! A large hits right on top on my sandals. But waist in both fit amazing with not pinching or binding on either size!
I love the material they’re just so long though they’re still in my closet after three months because I’ll never get around to hemming them

I love these pant! Before wearing I washed them alone in cold water to keep the colors from bleeding. Pants material is decent thickness, has elastic waist with side leg pockets, legs are loose but not too wide. They are comfortable perfect for beach or everyday wear.

For $37, I expected these pants to be a bit better quality.  They are very thin, which wouldn't necessarily be a bad thing, but there are strings coming off on a lot of the seams.  They are super comfortable, so I will go ahead & keep them, but I would not purchase again & am guessing I'll be sewing them at some point in the future.

I ordered 5 different pairs of pants on the same day.. these are by far my favorite to wear.

Good: I'm 5'11" 245lbs - ordered an XL and it's a tad big. Very high waisted, which for us tall gals works in our favor, but shorter folks may have to roll it down a few times. The pant touch the top of my feet which is incredibly awesome.  The bad: very odd placement of pockets. A very OBVIOUS rip on one of the pocket seams. I highly recommend these pants! They’re lightweight, very comfortable, and the color/pattern is really cool. I wanted a pant for around the house/daily activities and also something I could wear to a music festival. These are definitely it. The pockets are a nice touch too 😃

The colors were dark and dull. Not at all as pictured. I will be returning. They were meant to be at a celebration of life ceremony. We were asked to wear bright colors, specifically bright tie dye clothing. These were just the opposite. Very sad.

I bought one pair for a trip and they packed nicely and still looked good right out of the suitcase. Ended up buying a 2nd pair since I liked the first so much.

I have the orange ones and the black ones, and I want to wear these all the frickin time! They are so comfortable and lightweight, it's amazing! Love love love these they are so cute and comfy. They do wear down easily tho I have a few holes already after less than a year of wear and washing but would get another pair

Beautiful fabric A little too long for my short legs Super comfy

评论概述: Runs big, super comfy, “tye dye black” is not nearly as brightly as picture
评论详情: Super comfy, not too thick, flowy, high waisted.  I currently weight 170… 5’6 and have an hour glass figure. 42in hips, 33 waist- mediums fit me great, I got large at first and they would have also been fine but are too long and much more baggy. The medium are the perfect length and fit me better.  I liked the color on the large better they were a little more bright, the mediums decidedly do not have as much tie dye on them or rather it’s just not a lot of the bright blue which I really liked but the fit us better and the color is good enough. I may at some point buy one of the other colors because I really do like them.  Other reviews say they bleed really bad, I so update my review after I wash them off this is a problem.. however I recommend anyone reading to do the hippie tye dye method of white vinegar before washing (google it) to set the dye. After that wash in cold water on gentle or hand wash. Then hang dry. If I don’t add to this techies one that went well and I’m still happy.  Edit- I just bought these pants in small (the bright blue tie dye ones) as well and they fit perfect, still flow but they give me more of a shape and fit my butt/legs in a much more flattering way. So depending on what look you’re going for but the mediums are so much more baggy than the smalls (which are still baggy and comfy but I don’t swim in them).  I’m going to say I love both, the mediums I like to wear when I’m feeling bloated because they are baggy but still tight on my waist so I feel like it hides my stomach if I’m self conscious about it. I also like the baggy pants but tighter crop top (or tied up t shirt) look — I get so many compliments on both pair. Hope this helps!!

The colors are just as pictured, the size medium was true to size and they are comfortable and soft. I washed them and hung to dry, they did not bleed. They are super light and so perfect for the hot weather.

评论概述: Warning- if you buy one pair, you will buy more!
评论详情: It’s probably about time I write a review considering I’m about to order my 5th pair of these and also have 5 pairs of the harem style with the cinched ankles. I work from home and literally wear these pants every day until I have to switch to warmer comfy pants for winter. Literally, as in the actual meaning of the word ‘literally’ lol.  These pants are SO comfy. The waistband is elastic and stretchy and doesn’t get uncomfortable or dig in. The pockets are nice sized and fit my dog’s ball, some treats, and some bags for outside play time with room to spare. I prefer these wide leg ones to the harem style, (just my own weird sensory issues stuff) but these can drag on the ground a bit for me, so the harem style is great for when it’s been a little rainy outside and I don’t want my pant legs getting wet or muddy. I bought my first pair of these in probably 2018 (maybe even 2017), and some of the elastic isn’t quite what it used to be, but they’ve held up really well considering how many times I’ve worn and washed them. And I still wear them all the time- they’re still in pretty great shape. (I wash them on cold, delicate cycle, and then I hang them to dry- I’m not someone who’s super careful about garment care and following washing directions lol, and they’ve held up really well for me.)  If you’re on the fence, buy the pants. They’re really super comfy. For reference, I’m around 5’6”and 175lbs-ish; I could probably get away with a large pretty easily, but I like an oversized xl. (The rainbow black are my favorite.)
These are my second pair and I love them! They are flowy, comfy and not too see through. They wash well but I would hang dry to avoid shrinking.

These are NOT thin and flimsy! But they’re also not thick and stuffy. They’re just right for a comfy, casual pant. They are definitely worth the extra money and I will be buying them in ALL the colors!  I got an XL and am 5’7” 230 lbs. Plenty of room and one of the rare times a pant that isn’t labeled “long” or “tall”, is actually long enough for me. Perfect length when wearing sneakers, might be a little too long for flats or flip flops.
love them. They are very long and I am going to have them taken up. I am washing on delicate and laying flat to drip dry.
So comfy and feel great… buy the pants!
I would repurchase these. I was pleasantly surprised by how much I like these.
Looks just like the photo on line
So cute! Def recommend

I get compliments every time I wear these! They are easy to care for, delicate cycle and shake and hang right away, that’s it. I am 5’7” and 145 lbs and wear a medium. I just ordered another pair. I highly recommend.
I love how the fabric is so lightweight and they fit so comfortably. I get compliments every time I wear them. Bought a second pair!

I have 3 of these so far and plan to order more. They are a little long but not a game changer. These fall nicely on the body, super comfortable and can even be dressed up a little with the right accessories. You can’t go wrong with these. I got them in XL but will try Large the next purchase as these have quite a bit of wiggle room.

Love these pants I’m 5’6 210 and the xl fits great. Only complaint is they’re a tad long and I have to roll them up often but not bothered badly enough to not want a second pair in the 70’s orange. Well is been a couple of months since I bought the black rainbow and they’ve become my go to for stylish and comfy pants so naturally I ordered more in the 70’s orange and Miami teal, the 70s orange are fantastic and the pics don’t even do them justice. Unfortunately the Miami teal wasn’t anything like the pic. I didn’t even get a snapshot. These are real tie dye so there’s some variation but the Miami teal colors were muddled together but 2 out of three isn’t bad. I’d hope to order the sunset orange but it was completely out of stock. I’m going to wait till I size down since I’m on a weight loss journey, but don’t hesitate to buy either variation seen here. Im down 10 lbs but still went with the xl but I do wash them on delicate and dry them on the extra low setting and they have held up good so far with no shrinkage. So I’ve bought another pair in black rainbow after 45 pound weight loss and they’re just as beautiful.

Wowie, I was in the fence about these but they are sooooo lightweight and comfy! They bleed a bit the first few washes, but other than that no complaints! Going to wear them to a concert this weekend and it's supposed to be 100 degrees and I think these will be perfect. The only thing, what are the long azz drawstrings about?

Love the style & colors of these pants. I ordered 3 pairs. Unfortunately all 3 developed random holes near the pockets after one wear. Too much of a coincidence for all 3 to do that. Bad quality I guess :( sad

I bought three total pairs of different groovy designs. They're light weigh and I love the loose fit. There was no bleeding when I first hand washed them in cold water. They're not see-through. I'm so lucky I can wear them to work! Fabulous pants! Exactly what I was looking for. And I'll probably buy more.
